item.title: People Analytics - Employee Turnover
item.description:
In mid 2019, Gallup estimated that a trillion dollars was what U.S. businesses were losing every year due to voluntary employee turnover. With a trillion dollars on the table, businesses may also want to take other steps to curb turnover and keep their workforce happy and engaged.

However, for a company with the range of hundreds to thousands of employees plus bureaucratic processes, how the managers are going to find, talk and engage the right employee at the right time?

How it makes it possible to spot those individuals that are most likely to leave?

And how many of them are considering leaving the company?

To see how this problem was tackled, check the full story at GitHub:

https://github.com/brunokatekawa/PeopleAnalytics_Turnover

Stack used:

  • Python
  • Pandas
  • NumPy
  • Seaborn
  • Scikit-learn
  • Imblearn
  • Streamlit
  • Heroku
